answerText: "The Laughing Man"[10] Muriel Glass discusses her husband Seymour with her mother on the phone, while Seymour spends a day on the beach with the four year old Sybil Carpenter in this other short story by J.D Salinger. The story ends with Seymour shooting himself in the head.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 5 | 12 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The end of the Chief's romance with Mary Hudson leads to a disturbing end to the story of the title character. [10] Identify this story told by the Chief to the Comache club about the escapades of the title character and his companions while fleeing from the famous detective Marcel Dufarge.
